keyword: jack in the box taco calories
title: Jack in the Box Taco Calories
meta_description: Learn jack in the box taco calories: one taco has 147 kcal, plus carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and fast-food nutrition details.
h1: Jack in the Box Taco Calories
assumptions: Standard crunchy shell taco with seasoned beef, cheddar cheese, lettuce, and mild taco sauce; approximately 78 g per taco.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, and customizations; values based on official Jack in the Box data. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One Jack in the Box taco provides 147 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with fast-food menus.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Jack in the Box taco?
What are the macros for Jack in the Box taco calories?
faqs.a: 6 g protein, 6 g fat, 15 g carbs (2 g fiber) per taco.

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Jack in the Box tacos?
faqs.a: Yes, about 320 mg sodium per taco from seasoning and sauce.

faqs.q: How many calories in two Jack in the Box tacos?
Does the Jack in the Box taco have trans fat?
faqs.a: No trans fat (0 g) in the standard taco.
